Articles.Content:
I'm interested to know what other people have called their space programs. I've called mine SEAK which stands for Space Exploration Administration of Kerbin, and before that I had the Kerbol Exploration Agency. I made flags for both of them but I've lost them because my hard drive broke . So if you would like to, share your agency's names, and custom flags

Edit: I made a new flag for my program this morning.

Edited December 3, 2014 by Bluelogic32

KSAGA

Kerbal Space and Golf Association

Its not really much of a saga yet...

My career save is called KASA because I wasn't feeling particularly creative the day I started that save

As for individual programs, I originally tried to have Norse mythology names, thus Asgard (Kerbin station), Valhalla (Mun base), Valkyrie (lander series, also the program for landing on new planets) etc. Then I kinda forgot about that and in career I also have Magellan (Mun exploration) and Kopernikus (Minmus exploration).

I currently have no custom flags, however. This is a new computer and I haven't got around to installing Photoshop or anything like that yet.

Im a sucker for Pony Related things ( Wha? Who would have guessed!?). So my Current Agency is "NLR Lunar Exploration Force" (NLR = New Lunar Republic, Princess Luna, etc... wont bore you with details) Right now all my ships are usually used once, then scrapped once i unlock the next tech in the tree, so they are all "Oribiter One", "Lunar Explorer Two".... though once i actually get more permanent launch vehicles they will be things like Pegasus, Luna, Cloudsdale, etc.

Badger Industries: Roofing and Rockets

It's the name of a halo clan my friend has "Badger Clan". Our logo is a Buzz Saw Badger Paw.

National Kerbal Socialist Space Program

It did not turn out well.

Career. I am that boring. Usually.

As for flag, I use a design based on the coat of arms of the town I was born in.

Lunar Republic Program was my very first save ever. Landed on every inner planet except Moho.

Then came America, Merica, Murica, Silver Storm Mane Exports (SSME lel), and Amurcia.

Ships are named Artemis, Columbus, Cabot, Audi, Magellan, Hudson, Nickle Plate, Super Chief, Spaceliner, Station Artemis, Station Aurora, Munbase Alpha, and many others.
The Kerbal Administration for Big Overpowered Orbital Machines, or KABOOM. My budding artist daughter created the flag.
LASA. Imaginative.
Sailor Mun
I didn't give it a fancy name; I just call it the Kerbal Space Program. As for flags I use a picture of a paramecium, which if you want it can be downloaded here.

Generally speaking I name my space program Wolf Aerospace (cause I like wolves) and use this flag:

http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2011/251/6/1/custom_flag_2___wolf_by_greatpaperwolf-d49aoh0.png

...Munbase Alpha...

aeiou?

I would like to order a pizza

You can not order a pizza

Why?

Becaue you are John Madden

0.25 Career mode

Flag is the bulgarian national flag 'cause I'm bulgarian.

Yeah, I'm not very imaginative

Kerbal Space Program

How original, isn't it.

Space Navigation And Colonization Kommittee (S.N.A.C.K.)

KASA

Kerbiet Ministry of Cosmic Exploration and Potato Science

My current space program, started the night .25 released, is creatively titled "CAREERTEST".

I use stock flags, because I'm lazy.
Potato Orbital Processes
The Kerbal space program

IMC - Interplanetary Mining Corporation

I used the Kerthane mod heavily in my game before Kerbonite came along - which I've recently switched to in .24 - .25 .

Flag is the old space lego logo

My program is called K.R.A.K.E.N. - Kerbal Rocket and Airplane Kinetic Explosions Navigation Here's a pic of the flag: http://s1289.photobucket.com/user/argylas/media/KRAKEN5_zps317ace88.jpg.html

0.25 Career mode

Flag is the bulgarian national flag 'cause I'm bulgarian.

Yeah, I'm not very imaginative
